Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: Set
n: nat
φ: V -> nat
ν: pos n -> nat
p: dio_polynomial V nat

Goal:
dp_eval φ ν (dp_proj_par p) = dp_eval φ (fun i : nat => match le_lt_dec n i with | left _ => 0 | right H => ν (nat2pos H) end) p

Premises:
dp_proj_par = fix dp_proj_par (p : dio_polynomial V nat) : dio_polynomial V (pos n) := match p with | dp_nat c => dp_nat c | dp_var v => dp_var v | dp_par p0 => match le_lt_dec n p0 with | left _ => dp_nat 0 | right H => dp_par (nat2pos H) end | dp_comp o p0 q => dp_comp o (dp_proj_par p0) (dp_proj_par q) end : dio_polynomial V nat -> dio_polynomial V (pos n)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
le_lt_dec : forall n m : nat, {n <= m} + {m < n}
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
dp_eval : forall V P : Set, (V -> nat) -> (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> nat
nat2pos : forall n x : nat, x < n -> pos n
dp_ren_par_eval : forall (V P Q : Set) (f : P -> Q) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : Q -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_ren_par f p) = dp_eval φ (fun i : P => ν (f i)) p
dp_eval_ext : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (φ' : V -> nat) (ν' : P -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), (forall v : V, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i : P, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p
dee_eval = fun (φ ν : nat -> nat) (e : dio_elem_expr) => match e with | dee_nat n => n | dee_var v => φ v | dee_par i => ν i | dee_comp o v w => de_op_sem o (φ v) (φ w) end : (nat -> nat) -> (nat -> nat) -> dio_elem_expr -> nat Arguments dee_eval (_ _)%function_scope
dp_eval_fix_mul : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
dp_inst_par_eval : forall (V P E : Set) (σ : P -> nat) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : E -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_inst_par E σ p) = dp_eval φ σ p
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
df_mexists_spec : forall (n : nat) (f : dio_formula) (ν : nat -> nat), df_pred (df_mexists n f) ν < -> (exists π : nat -> nat, df_pred f (fun i : nat => if le_lt_dec n i then ν (i - n) else π i))
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
dio_elem.g0 = fun n x0 x1 x2 x3 x4 x5 x6 x7 m : nat => if le_lt_dec n m then match m - n with | 0 => x0 | 1 => x1 | 2 => x2 | 3 => x3 | 4 => x4 | 5 => x5 | 6 => x6 | S (S (S (S (S (S (S _)))))) => x7 end else x0 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments dio_elem.g0 (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%nat_scope
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat] ?n : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat] ?n : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
dio_poly_pos : forall (P : Set) (m : nat) (p : dio_polynomial nat P), (forall x : nat, In x (dp_var_list p) -> x < m) -> {q : dio_polynomial (pos m) P | forall (φ : nat -> nat) (ν : P -> nat), dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos (fun2vec 0 m φ)) ν q}
dio_elem_single : forall l : list dio_constraint, {E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2 + 20 * length l /\ (forall ν φ : nat -> nat, dp_eval φ ν (fst E) = dp_eval φ ν (snd E) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l)}
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pred _%nat_scope
convex_n_eq : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => 2 * (f i * g i)) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * f i + g i * g i) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i)
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]
de_bruijn_ext = fun (X : Type) (ν : nat -> X) (x : X) => fix dbe (n : nat) : X := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => ν n0 end : forall X : Type, (nat -> X) -> X -> nat -> X Arguments de_bruijn_ext {X}%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%nat_scope
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => BinNums.Z0 | S n0 => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_nat _%nat_scope
nat_compare_alt = fun n m : nat => match lt_eq_lt_dec n m with | inleft (left _) => Lt | inleft (right _) => Eq | inright _ => Gt end : nat -> nat -> comparison Arguments nat_compare_alt (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [V : Set n : nat φ : V -> nat ν : pos n -> nat p : dio_polynomial V nat |- nat]

```coq
intros.
unfold dp_proj_par.
induction p.
- simpl. rewrite dp_eval_ext; auto.
  + intros. destruct (dp_var_list dp_nat); auto.
  + intros. destruct (dp_par_list dp_nat); auto.
- simpl. rewrite dp_eval_ext; auto.
  + intros. destruct (dp_var_list dp_var); auto.
  + intros. destruct (dp_par_list dp_var); auto.
- simpl. rewrite dp_eval_fix_add; auto.
  rewrite IHp1. rewrite IHp2. auto.
- simpl. rewrite dp_eval_fix_mul; auto.
  rewrite IHp1. rewrite IHp2. auto.
Qed.
